title: Naanga Podiyan Lyrics Pugazh Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Pugazh  Naanga Podiyan Song Lyrics
Singer(s): Anirudh Ravichander & Diwakar

Naanga dhaan da 
podian dhaan da
Aattam dhan da
Oorukulla king da

Pondicherry kadal oram 
kondadalaam vaada machi vaa
Currency ku panjam illa 
collara dhaan thooki vidu da.
Konjam kooda kavala illa 
Thuli kooda bayamum illa
Friendsunga kooda ninna 
pichidalaam da 
Life eh game dhaan da
Aadi paakalaam da 
Adichi thookinaaka 
sachin naama da

Naanga dhaan da 
podian dhaan da
Aattam dhan da
Oorukulla king da dei

Kaasu irundha Venaa dhaadi da
Andha ulaga azhagi unaku jodi da
Namma life one day match da
Indha nimisham pona poye pochu da

Onnum venaam da 
oru mannum venaam da
Friends mattum podhum 
vera ponnum venaa da
Rocket venaam da 
oru flightum venaam da
Naama vaanathila parakka 
oru bottle podhum da

Yaaru vandhaalum summa nikkadhey
Kadavul vandhaalum kadaney ketpome
Yaaru vandhaalum summa nikkadhey
Yemaney vandhaalum yeguri adipome

Naanga dhaan da 
podian dhaan da
Aattam dhan da
Oorukulla king da 

Dei
Pondicherry kadal oram 
kondadalaam vaada machi vaa
Currency ku panjam illa 
collara dhaan thooki vidu da.
Konjam kooda kavala illa 
Thuli kooda bayamum illa
Friendsunga kooda ninna 
pichidalaam da 
Life eh game dhaan da
Aadi paakalaam da 
Adichi thookinaaka 
sachin naama da

Naanga.. Podiyan.. Aattam .. 
oorukulla king da..
Naanga.. Podiyan.. Aattam .. 
oorukulla king da.. Dei..
